LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv1.label: Kaifuku Power Lv.1
LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv1.description: Tip 1: Earn experience points for Kaifuku (Recovery) Power by continuing to eat foods with the same type of buff.
LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv2.label: Kaifuku Power Lv.2
LanguageData.Hediffs_MetabolismLv2.description: Tip 2: This buff can go up to Level 4.
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.label: Kaifuku Power
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.description: Thank you for letting me experience all the flavors of the world!\nKnowledge is power, and what better way to learn than to eat, eat, eat! Kanpai!
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.stages.0.label: initial
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.stages.1.label: Lv.3
LanguageData.Hediffs_Metabolism.stages.2.label: Lv.4 Max
